item.title: Define all maximum of all sliding windows size k
item.description: Source code Problem description Given an array of n elements. Define the maximum value of every sliding window size k of that array. A window size k of the array is any subarray of k elements of original array. Example: Input: arr = {7, 6, 5, 4, 8, 9, 1}, and window size k = 3 Output: {7, 6, 8, 9, 9} Algorithm 1. Naive algorithm Naive algorithm is to scan each window separately, and find the maximum value of each window.
